title: Casa AbundancYah B&B
description: A vegetarian bed and breakfast enveloped by a garden plethora of plants, butterflies, exotic birds, and monkeys, a habitat designed for the ultimate rainforest experience. Arise to the sounds of the jungle as you make your way to begin the day with a cup of organic coffee, tea, or fresh coconut water. Breakfast is served on a noni or banana leaf with vegetarian, vegan, raw, and gluten-free options.
streetAddress: Big Creek Coastal Road to Bluff Beach, Isla Colon
